content: ssssccccrrrraaaappppppppyyyy ssssttttrrrriiiippppeeeessss just a simple little scarf to use up bits of yarn you have lying around - lionbrand wool ease - h hook ch216 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and ea across *change colors ch2 single_crochet in flo of nxt single_crochet and ea across* repeat * to * twice more change colors *ch3 double_crochet in flo of nxt single_crochet and ea across* repeat 3 times more or more if wider scarf is desired add fringe matching hat to come finished scarf uses 2 75 oz of worsted weight 3 5 inches wide 69 inches long not including fringe i ll make another one to let you know how much of each color was used enjoy www rebeccavelasquez com
